import React, { useState } from "react"; function Form() { const InitialState = {id: 0, nome: "", estacao: "", data: ""}; const [dados, setDados] = useState(InitialState); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setDados({...dados, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}); } return (

); }; export default Form;
